text: من دون الله فاهدوهم الى صرط الجحيم

translations.translation: Other than God," (the angels will be told), "then show them the way to Hell,
apart from Allah, and direct them to the path of Hell,
besides God, and show them the way of hell.
“Instead of Allah – and herd them to the path leading to hell.”
Instead of Allah, and lead them on to the way of flaming Fire (Hell);
Besides Allah, then lead them to the way to hell.
apart from God, and guide them unto the path of Hell!
Instead of Allah, and lead them to the path to hell;
besides God, and lead them to the path of the Fire;
Beside Allah, and lead them on to the path of the Flaming Fire.
besides Allah, and show them the way to hell!
Besides Allah, and lead them to the Way to the (Fierce) Fire!
Instead of Allah, and lead them on to the way of flaming Fire (Hell);
other than Allah, and guide them to the Path of Hell!
Besides God, and lead them to the way to Hell.
Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
[37:23] besides God, in other words, other than Him, in the way of graven images, and lead them, direct them and drive them, to the path of Hell, the way to the Fire.
(Instead of Allah, and lead them to the path to hell) to the middle of hell;

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وما كانوا يعبدون من دون الله } أي: الأصنام، اجمعوها معهم، { فاهْدُوهم إلى صراطِ الجحيم } أي: دُلوهم على طريقها، وعرّفوهم بها
 وعن الأصمعي: يقال: هديته في الدين هُدى، وهديته الطريق هداية
